channel.title: Nlp on Jesse Tweedle
channel.description: Recent content in Nlp on Jesse Tweedle

item.title: Friends episode titles, pt. 1
item.description: I always wanted to be a scriptwriter. But my approach to doing creative things is “find the secret, program it, retire”. So what’s the secret to a successful Friends episode? [Really, I want to write/experience a gentle introduction to the following things: rvest, tidytext, and language data science.] I’ll explore this data science via a workflow like: Get data via IMDB / rvest Explore—what am I looking for? Set up a model Draw conclusions Next steps Get data I’ll get data on Friends episodes from IMDB via rvest (see here for tutorials and documentation).
